Class ColorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.image.ColorUtils

  • public final class ColorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for easier color manipulation.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

        Parameters:

                            int argb2,
                            float ratio)
        Mixes to colors and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        argb1 - color to mix with another
        argb2 - color with which the first color will be fixed
        ratio - the ratio with which the first color will be mixed into the second
        Returns:
